resources.string:
Enable the Mute service to automagically mute Spotify ads.

Ads playing after you skip a track or ads on Spotify startup cannot be muted.

For devices with aggressive battery saving (especially Huawei/Samsung/Xiaomi) please read up on this site before you give a bad rating: 

dontkillmyapp.com

You can check the notification for last detected song. If the song is not correct the app is being killed/Spotify has bugged out and does not report any new songs. 

If somehow ads are playing anyway or songs gets muted, check the Play Store description on countermeasures to take.

For easy access check out the widget and Quick Settings tile.
This is the visible notification when ad muting is turned on.
Mute for Spotify needs \'Device Broadcast Status\' enabled in Spotify to work. Go to Spotify settings and enable it.
Spotify is required for this app to work.
Ad detection is unfortunately not possible in Spotify Lite. Please use the full Spotify app.\n\nThis app will exit!
Adjust the unmute buffer, in case you hear the last part of an ad. Default 500 ms.
